node.title: What is tromethamine? It is used to stabilize Covid vaccines.
node.alt: Vials of the childrenâ€™s version of the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine can be stored unopened in regular refrigerators for up to 10 weeks.
node.description: Also known as tris, the compound helps maintain the pH of vaccines, extending shelf life at warmer temperatures.
node.content: ["When the Food and Drug Administration authorized the emergency use of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine in children ages 5 to 11 last month, the agency noted that the pediatric version would be a bit different than the one for adults: a third the size, with a different buffer for added stability. ", "The news set off a wave of disinformation on social media about the new ingredient: Tris, or tromethamine. ", "The ingredient, however, has a time-tested track record of safety. It is \u201ca commonly used buffer in a variety of other F.D.A.-approved vaccines and other biologics, including products for use in children,\u201d the agency said in its statement announcing the authorization for Pfizer\u2019s pediatric doses.", "Such buffers \u201chelp maintain a vaccine\u2019s pH (a measure of how acidic or alkaline a solution is) and stability,\u201d according to the F.D.A., which says that the new formulation gives vaccine providers more flexibility in storage. ", "Pfizer\u2019s pediatric dose also removes extra salt \u2014 sodium chloride and potassium chloride \u2014 according to Dr. Sandra Fryhofer, the American Medical Association\u2019s liaison to a Centers for Disease Control and Prevention immunization committee. Taken together with the \u201ctris buffer,\u201d she said in an A.M.A. interview, the changes \u201cmake the vaccine product more stable at regular refrigerator temperatures for longer periods of time. The kid version vials can be stored unopened in regular refrigerators for up to 10 weeks.\u201d ", "The ingredient is not specific to Pfizer\u2019s pediatric Covid vaccine doses. Kit Longley, a Pfizer spokesman, said in an email on Saturday that the compound was being used in adult doses as of this month, and that the manufacturing and ingredient list were otherwise unchanged. Tromethamine is also used in Moderna\u2019s Covid vaccine. ", "", "", "", ""]
